post:
Hi guys,

We have recently moved our Secaucus site to Equinix NY2 and adopted a new upstream [GSL Networks](https://globalsecurelayer.com/).

IPv6 and BGP are still in progress, I think we should be able to deliver them next month.

You can use `170.39.226.151` for testing.

## Offers

S2N-1C1G

- 1 vCore
- 1 GiB DDR4 Memory
- 16 GiB RAID 1 NVMe SSD
- <del>1 TiB Traffic</del> fair use shared until Apr 1
- <strong>$5 / mo</strong>

[Order](https://app.misaka.io/iaas/vm/create/ewr02/s2n-1c1g)

For customers who want Windows, we still provide 2016 / 2019 license for free but it requires at least 32 GB disk space.

Higher plans can be found on the page below:

https://www.misaka.io/pricing/mc2/ewr02
